radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild dependent atelectasis bilaterally; appendix hyperemic with mucosal thickening measuring up to 1.1 cm with adjacent fatty stranding; no evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion, no focal lesions in liver, pancreas, spleen, kidneys; normal urinary bladder and distal ureters; no free fluid in pelvis; left inguinal hernia containing fat.
